Off-Road Vehicle Recovery

We recover vehicles stuck in remove or difficult terrain.

Call (403) 606-5084

Servicing Calgary and surrounding areas

Off-Road Recovery – We Get You Out of Tough Spots

If you’re stuck in mud, snow, or a ditch, you need a team that can safely recover your vehicle without causing additional damage. Our off-road recovery experts use specialized winching equipment and techniques to handle even the most challenging situations.

Whether you’re in a remote area, construction site, or farmland, we have the trucks and experience to get you out.

Contact us

Frequently Asked Questions

What areas do you serve?

We serve Calgary and surrounding areas, including rural roads and highways.

Are your services available 24/7?

Yes, we offer emergency towing and roadside assistance 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

What types of vehicles do you tow?

We tow all types of vehicles including cars, trucks, motorcycles, and heavy-duty equipment.

How much does it cost?

Our prices vary by service and distance. Contact us directly for a free estimate.
